abstract: Citigroup is in talks with Kohlberg Kravis Roberts, the private equity shop, to provide financing for its purchase of some of the leveraged loans on the bank’s balance sheet, The Financial Times reported. Citigroup has apparently also talked to other private equity firms about providing such funding.
